name: BillingOutage
comment: Maintains the details of outages reported by customers. Outage can be reported at many levels such as, subscriber, Billing Arrangement (BA), or the offer instance when service is not available at that level.
vf short description: Maintains the details of outages reported by customers. Outage can be reported at many levels such as, subscriber, Billing Arrangement (BA), or the offer instance when service is not available at that level.

fields.name: BillingOutageSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ValidFromDate
fields.comment: BI field which represents record validity begin in EDWH

fields.name: ValidUntilDate
fields.comment: BI field which represents record validity end in EDWH

fields.name: KeyTypeId
fields.comment: Key type of record

fields.name: BillingOutageKey
fields.comment: Unique identifier of the billing outage in ALDM. Each billing outage key value represents a unique billing outage. BL1_OUTAGE_HISTORY.RECEIVER_CUSTOMER + BL1_OUTAGE_HISTORY.SERVICE_RECEIVER_ID + BL1_OUTAGE_HISTORY.SERVICE_RECEIVER_TYPE + BL1_OUTAGE_HISTORY.OFFER + BL1_OUTAGE_HISTORY.OFFER_INSTANCE + BL1_OUTAGE_HISTORY.OUTAGE_START_DATE//Generated Key based on Customer Key,  Service Receiver Id, Service Receiver Type Ind,  Product Catalog Key, Offer Instance Id, Outage Start Date

fields.name: AssignedBillingOfferSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ServiceReceiverTypeInd
fields.comment: Indicates the type of service receiver entity.Values are:B - BA C - CUSTOMER G - GROUP I - OFFER_INSTANCE K - PARTITION_KEY O - OC_CHARGE P - PAY_CHANNEL S - SUBSCRIBER U - UNIT Y - CYCLE BL1_OUTAGE_HISTORY.SERVICE_RECEIVER_TYPE

fields.name: CustomerSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ServiceReceiverId
fields.comment: Identifies the entity level, at which the outage has been reported in the receiving service. For example, subscriber Id. BL1_OUTAGE_HISTORY.SERVICE_RECEIVER_ID

fields.name: OutageStartDate
fields.comment: Specifies the date on which the billing outage has started. BL1_OUTAGE_HISTORY.OUTAGE_START_DATE

fields.name: ProductCatalogSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: OutageEndDate
fields.comment: Specifies the date on which the billing outage has ended. BL1_OUTAGE_HISTORY.OUTAGE_END_DATE

fields.name: SubscriberSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: BillingArrangementSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: PayChannelSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: BssCreationDate
fields.comment: Indicates the date on which the record was created in the source system. BL1_OUTAGE_HISTORY.SYS_CREATION_DATE

fields.name: BssModificationDate
fields.comment: Indicates the date on which a record was modified in the source system BL1_OUTAGE_HISTORY.SYS_UPDATE_DATE

fields.name: ModificationEmployeeSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: OfferInstanceId
fields.comment: Identifies the billing offer instance. BL1_OUTAGE_HISTORY.OFFER_INSTANCE

fields.name: SourceSystemId
fields.comment: Represents the code of the source system that the leading entity of the current target is coming from. It is suffix also include the code of the DB instance on that system such that in case of multiple instances of the same source system are deployed (Scalability) it will be possible to trace the target to it is source system instance

fields.name: DeleteIndicator
fields.comment: Set to True when the leading source entity of this target entity was deleted in the source system

fields.name: RowUpdateTime
fields.comment: The time stamp when the row was written to the Target real-time/staging storage

fields.name: SourceUpdateTime
fields.comment: The latest create/update timestamp of any of the entities composing this target entity

fields.name: SourceQueryTime
fields.comment: The timestamp of reading the data from source system. - when using CDC it is usually similar to the latest update, in SQL cases it is the time of running the SQL. When a dummy target entity is created as a temporary entity to maintain referential integrity this indicator will be set to True. As soon as the real target entity is stored it will be stored with False dummy indicator value.

fields.name: DptiId
fields.comment: Counter which represents the cycle number of the job	is_deleted	boolean	is_deleted	Represents if the record is deleted. Is been updated after the compaction job

fields.name: PTime
fields.comment: Partition time based on the event time for target entities marked to be partitioned event time rounded the correct partition window (hourly, daily etc..)

fields.name: Insert_Load_Id
fields.comment: BI technical field for job id which inserted the record in the table

fields.name: Update_Load_Id
fields.comment: BI technical field for job id which updated the record in the table
